reviewText: The description of this product led me to believe it was a fitness DVD. It is only an informative DVD. It does not break down exercises for kids. This DVD is an informative tool.
Bought this as a gift for a friend's toddler, really good, have purchased other in this series for my grandkids and they love them!

Saw this advertised on CNN.  Bought it immediately.  We had our daughter and twin sons along with three friends over and when I turned it on they immediately stopped playing and started dancing.  Very creative and definitely something that the kids could identify with.  Awesome.  We bought the set.

This is one of my daughter's favorite DVDs. I actually get a work out while watching it with her. It's a perfect gift to encourage learning and being active. The music is great for dancing and singing! I highly recommend it to anyone with a toddler or with a toddler relative!
